text: Abdu Rozik is a Tajikistani singer, boxer and television personality. he participated in the Indian reality show Bigg Boss 16 in 2022. == Early life == Abdu was diagnosed with a growth hormone deficiency called rickets in childhood. and due to poverty his family could not afford to have him treated. and as of result now he stands at 3 ft 1 in (0.94 m). == Filmography == Year Show Role Notes Ref. 2022-23 Bigg Boss 16 Contestant 11th place 2023 Entertainment Ki Raat Housefull Himself Guest Bigg Boss OTT 2 Pyar Ka Pehla Naam: Radha Mohan Chota Bhaijan == Discography == Year Title Ref. 2022 Chota Bhaijaan 2023 Pyar == References == Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Television personalities Category:Singers
title: Abdu Rozik
